ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Dick Beck,Harry Lazarus,John Rosenberger,John Forte,Dick Beck,Harry Lazarus,John Rosenberger,John Forte
ComicInfo.Title: The Circular Trap!; Picture of the Future; Rocket to Nowhere!; The Human Touch
ComicInfo.Summary: Iknaton appears in the midst of World War II from ancient Egypt. He has the power of the Bablylonian Circle, which transports him through time, but it simply transports him from one prison to the next then back to the first.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
